pageProps.title: YOW! 2014 Edward Kmett - Stop Treading Water: Learning to Learn #YOW - YouTube

children.value: Kmett talk where he says that
Spaced repetition is about graph connectivity
and talks about how he uses github issue feeds to prompt him to revise things.
This talk has stuck in my head over years and years. Probably I want to reflect on why more deeply at some point.

backlinks.title: How is reality shaped to make spaced repetition a viable recall strategy?
